title: Mouse wheel scroll doesn't work in remote tmux
description: Mouse wheel scrolling does not work inside tmux on remote Ubuntu when attached via SSH. Investigated: remote tmux mouse on, wheel bindings present, terminfo ok. Likely nested tmux/local tmux capturing wheel events. Added local binding to forward WheelUp/Down to remote when pane_current_command is ssh/mosh-client. Validate by sourcing local tmux config, reattaching remote tmux, and scrolling in remote pane.

title: Make scrolling easier in tmux sessions (smooth/less abrupt)
description: Investigate tmux scroll behavior and adjust settings or key bindings to reduce fast/abrupt scrolling when session is active.
